topics.body:
Someone made a good point in one of the other threads last night, forgot which thread, but all current most popular websites on the internet became popular through shear dumb luck; facebook, deviantart, tumblr, reddit and such became popular through dumb luck.


A bit of news:
Whelp my prediction of the tea party fucking up the GOP this fall is coming to fruition; if you're wondering what is going on in Kansas the tea party is trying to throw their hat into the ring for a senate seat.  The reason why this is bad for republicans is that particular senate seat is key to who controls the senate; in other words if the tea party tries to gain control of the seat the democrats will continue to control the senate cause of how unlikely it is for the tea party to win.
Tl:dr; tea party is acting stupid again.
